publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2778 Des McNulty: Closure of BA’s Glasgow Cabin Crew Base—That the Parliament expresses grave concern about British Airway’s decision to close its Glasgow cabin crew base, as a result of which staff are being required either to relocate to London or accept voluntary redundancy; expresses concern about the implications for services between London and Scottish airports, and urges members and the public to sign up to the e-petition at www.saveBAscotland.co.uk, which seeks the retention of both the base and the jobs of almost 140 Scottish cabin crew.
S3M-2778 Closure of BA’s Glasgow Cabin Crew Base (lodged on 28 October 2008) Jamie Hepburn*, John Park*, Bill Kidd*, Michael McMahon*, Kenneth Gibson*, James Kelly*, Gil Paterson*, Hugh Henry*

S3M-2778 Closure of BA’s Glasgow Cabin Crew Base (lodged on 28 October 2008) Pauline McNeill*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Bill Wilson*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Andy Kerr*, Sarah Boyack*, Jackie Baillie*, Ken Macintosh*, Mary Mulligan*, Mr Frank McAveety*

S3M-2778 Des McNulty: Closure of BA’s Glasgow Cabin Crew Base—That the Parliament expresses grave concern about British Airway’s decision to close its Glasgow cabin crew base, as a result of which staff are being required either to relocate to London or accept voluntary redundancy; expresses concern about the implications for services between London and Scottish airports, and urges members and the public to sign up to the e-petition at www.saveBAscotland.co.uk, which seeks the retention of both the base and the jobs of almost 140 Scottish cabin crew. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, John Park, Bill Kidd, Michael McMahon, Kenneth Gibson, James Kelly, Gil Paterson, Hugh Henry, Pauline McNeill, Ms Wendy Alexander, Bill Wilson, Hugh O’Donnell, Andy Kerr, Sarah Boyack, Jackie Baillie, Ken Macintosh, Mary Mulligan, Mr Frank McAveety, Bill Butler*
S3M-2778 Closure of BA’s Glasgow Cabin Crew Base (lodged on 28 October 2008) Trish Godman*
S3M-2778 Closure of BA’s Glasgow Cabin Crew Base (lodged on 28 October 2008) John Wilson*
S3M-2778 Closure of BA’s Glasgow Cabin Crew Base (lodged on 28 October 2008) Cathy Jamieson*, Cathy Peattie*
S3M-2778 Closure of BA’s Glasgow Cabin Crew Base (lodged on 28 October 2008) Karen Gillon*
S3M-2778 Closure of BA’s Glasgow Cabin Crew Base (lodged on 28 October 2008) Marilyn Livingstone*
